gobblin.metrics.reporter

Class ContextAwareReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ContextAwareReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScheduledReporter

    public class ContextAwareReporter
extends Object
implements com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, Closeable
    Base Reporter for gobblin metrics. Automatically handles MetricContext selection, Metric filtering, and changes to reporting on MetricContext life cycle.

    The lifecycle of a ContextAwareReporter fully managed by the RootMetricContext is: construct -> start -> stop -> close. However, ContextAwareReporters created manually by the user can have a different life cycle (for example multiple calls to start / stop).

    • Method Detail

      • isStarted

        public boolean isStarted()

      • start

        public final void start()
        Starts the ContextAwareReporter. If the ContextAwareReporter has been started (and not stopped since), this is a no-op.

      • startImpl

        protected void startImpl()
        Actual logic for starting the ContextAwareReporter. This is a separate method from start() to allow ContextAwareReporter to handle the started / non-started state.

      • stop

        public final void stop()
        Stops the ContextAwareReporter. If the ContextAwareReporter has not been started, or if it has been stopped already, and not started since, this is a no-op.

      • stopImpl

        protected void stopImpl()
        Actual logic for stopping the ContextAwareReporter. This is a separate method from stop() to allow ContextAwareReporter to handle the started / non-started state.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Removes ContextAwareReporter records from the RootMetricContext. This method should be considered irreversible and destructive to the ContextAwareReporter.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        IOException

      • removedMetricContext

        protected void removedMetricContext(InnerMetricContext context)
        Called when any MetricContext is removed from the tree.
        Parameters:
        context - InnerMetricContext backing the removed MetricContext.

      • newMetricContext

        protected void newMetricContext(MetricContext context)
        Called whenever a new MetricContext is added to the tree.
        Parameters:
        context - new MetricContext added.

      • shouldReportInnerMetricContext

        protected boolean shouldReportInnerMetricContext(InnerMetricContext context)
        Whether a InnerMetricContext should be reported. Called when a MetricContext has been removed and just before the corresponding InnerMetricContext is removed.

      • getMetricContextsToReport

        protected Iterable<ReportableContext> getMetricContextsToReport()
        Returns:
        an Iterable of all MetricContexts to report.
